s.text: Indeed, two factions striving to succeed the Mongol rulers were warring nearby when Wang painted this commotion in the natural realm.
Indeed, two factions striving to succeed the Mongol rulers were warring nearby when Wang painted this commotion in the natural realm.
The year is 1964 and all seems well, notwithstanding the recent Great Famine, perhaps the most severe in human history and almost entirely Mao's fault.
Several objects in the show reflect a dry sense of humor.

It is not: "In the latter Tang dynasty," says the wall panel, "Buddhist images tended to become more ponderous, fleshy, and overly ornate, completely departing from the slender and ethereal beauty characteristic of many sixth-century sculptures."
This ingenious toy dates, incredibly, from circa 1100-771 B.C.
